symbols.name: BaseModel
symbols.docstring: Base model with common CRUD operations.

symbols.name: User.__init__
symbols.docstring:
Initialize user account.

        Args:
            username: User's unique username
            email: User's email address

symbols.name: User.authenticate
symbols.docstring:
Authenticate user with password.

        Args:
            password: User's password

        Returns:
            True if authentication successful

symbols.name: User.get_permissions
symbols.docstring:
Get user permissions.

        Returns:
            List of permission names

symbols.name: AdminUser.grant_permission
symbols.signature: def grant_permission(self, user_id: int, permission: str) -> bool
symbols.docstring:
Grant permission to another user.

        Args:
            user_id: Target user ID
            permission: Permission name to grant

        Returns:
            True if permission granted successfully

symbols.name: AdminUser.revoke_permission
symbols.signature: def revoke_permission(self, user_id: int, permission: str) -> bool
symbols.docstring:
Revoke permission from user.

        Args:
            user_id: Target user ID
            permission: Permission name to revoke

        Returns:
            True if permission revoked successfully

symbols.name: AdminUser.AuditLog.__init__
symbols.docstring:
Initialize audit log.

            Args:
                admin_id: Admin user ID

symbols.name: AdminUser.AuditLog.record
symbols.docstring:
Record admin action.

            Args:
                action: Action description

symbols.name: get_user_by_id
symbols.docstring:
Retrieve user by ID.

    Args:
        user_id: User ID to lookup

    Returns:
        User object if found, None otherwise

symbols.name: create_user
symbols.signature: def create_user(username: str, email: str) -> User
symbols.docstring:
Create new user account.

    Args:
        username: Desired username
        email: User's email

    Returns:
        Newly created User object

module_docstring:
Sample Python module for LoomGraph integration testing.

This module demonstrates all features that codeindex extracts for LoomGraph:
- Symbols (classes, methods, functions)
- Imports (with aliases)
- Inheritances (single, multiple, nested)
